name: hui-cbir
short_description: The main purpose of  project si to grasp how to extract some kind of features which maybe used for the image retrievel. Of course,content based image retrievel ,short for cbir ,is so complex and my poor level that I couldn't implement all the work.With the basis of FIRE  which is brought into effect by Thomas Deselaers etc, I analyse the code and try my best to append them for my target.If you have strong interest on cbir, please contact me.Maybe we have some happy disscusion on this topic through the internet.-:)
summary: linux c++ astronomical image process cbir
